definitions: A lawyer of noncontentious private civil law who drafts, takes, and records legal instruments for private parties, but does not appear in court on clients' beh0831cevices.;(common law) A legal practitioner who prepares, attests to, and certifies documents, witnesses affidavits, and administers oaths.;A lay person authorized as a non-lawyer public official whose main function is the notarization of certain types of important personal documentation.
